item.title: About Me
item.description: About Metalblueberry I’m a passionate developer moving toward the specialization in IoT technologies. I’ve experience with several technologies from the IoT world from the sensors to the cloud infrastructure. Sensoring: Arduino/ Raspberry Pi Transport: MQTT, HTTP, TCP/UDP Processing: Python Pandas Storage formats: Parquet, csv, json, xml… Analysis: SQL, Python Pandas, Jupyter Notebook Provider: REST API, Plotly Dash, PowerBI I’m also learning AWS services. I feel familiar with the following services.
